b,s,i=XXxYY

0,0,0= 8x 8
0,0,1= 8x 8
0,1,0=16x16
0,1,1=16x16

1,0,0= 8x 8
1,0,1= 8x 8
1,1,0=32x32
1,1,1=32x32

2,0,0= 8x 8
2,0,1= 8x 8
2,1,0=64x64
2,1,1=64x64

3,0,0=16x16
3,0,1=16x16
3,1,0=32x32
3,1,1=32x32

4,0,0=16x16
4,0,1=16x16
4,1,0=64x64
4,1,1=64x64

5,0,0=32x32
5,0,1=32x32
5,1,0=64x64
5,1,1=64x64

6,0,0=16x32 <16x16x2>
6,0,1=16x16
6,1,0=32x64 <32x32x2>
6,1,1=32x64 <32x32x2>

7,0,0=16x32 <16x16x2>
7,0,1=16x16
7,1,0=32x32
7,1,1=32x32
